page.title: 05ATWORTH AT WORK
page.content: The main source of employment,other than farming,is the Dowty Fuel Systems Company.Here precision fuel systems,mainly for aircraft,are designed and manufactured. There are a few small individual busisneses including furniture restorers,plumbers,electricians, builders,and motor servicing.These each employ a few people,while the village shops give further employment. Because of good communications, people are also able to travel to work in the surrounding towns of Bath, Corsham and Melksham.
